outputs.output_descr: Poor and vulnerable groups have increased and more equatable access to quality basic social services and benefits, in a strengthened pro-poor environment. Enhanced response to, and mitigation of, natural disasters improve living conditions for the poor. Improve inter-agency cooperation and coordination, strengthen  regional early-warning and disaster preparedness and response capacities, harmonization of disaster management, etc.

donor_name: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HUMA

project_descr: Joint Project Enhancing coordination for disaster response in the Kyrgyz Republic
